message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it will be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,500.  What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm eager to make a deal, $12,500 is a bit too low for me.  Could you do $14,000?
Hi Alice, I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to meet me at $13,500?
